    • Method Detail

      • isLEConnected

        public boolean isLEConnected()
        Indicates if we are connected by checking if the V1Connection is inside of the connected devices list the framework returns.
        Returns:
        True if there is a connection to a V1Connection LE otherwise, false.

      • getSocket

        public BluetoothSocket getSocket()
        Deprecated. DO NOT USE. THIS METHOD WILL BE REMOVED IN THE NEXT API RELEASE.
        Bluetooth LE does not use BluetoothSockets so always return null.
        Specified by:
        getSocket in class VR_BluetoothWrapper
        Returns:
        BluetoothSocket of the current Bluetooth connection, if available otherwise, null. (Bluetooth LE connections do not using BluetoothSockets so null will always be returned)
